column4: if i want to see the themes that i have installed with synaptic i do what ?
if i want to see the themes that i have installed with synaptic i do what ? again if someone has the answer ty in advance
i will google until i see my name highlight thank you
Search in installed packages for things with "theme" in their description.  I don't think there's something programmed in there for themes (a category or whatnot)
